Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: make a new raw xtn and try again

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @Bryan_Beus since Overwinter network upgrade (part of Sapling stuff), transactions are valid until `nExpiryHeight`, which defaults to 60 blocks in the future, or ~ 1 hour  with KMD. in raw xtns, you can set it to any value you want, not sure all RPCs allow modifying it
